nodes.documentation: SafeMath implementation used by the base BOMBv3 contract.
nodes.name: BombV3SafeMath

nodes.documentation: Return `a` rounded up to the nearest multiple of `m`.
nodes.name: ceil

nodes.documentation: ERC-20 token which wraps BOMBv3 and keeps it from exploding.
nodes.name: WBOMB

nodes.documentation:
Replicate the BOMBv3 logic to get the amount received in a transfer.
   * 1% of the tokens transfered will self-destruct, so we return the other 99%.
nodes.name: getAmountReceived

nodes.documentation:
Returns the amount of BOMBv3 held by the contract.
   * Should always correspond exactly to the WBOMB total supply.
nodes.name: baseTokenSupply
